<script>
  if (window.innerWidth < 1024 && document.cookie.indexOf("smart_banner_close=true") < 0) {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "flex";

    var style = document.createElement('style');
    var css = document.createTextNode('.drop-down-mask { top : 170px; }');
    style.appendChild(css);
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }

  const downloadBtn = document.getElementById("download_app_btn");
  downloadBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    let url = "https://edn.page.link/ednappdl2023";
    window.location.href = url ;
  });

  const smartBannercloseBtn = document.querySelector(".appbanner_btns .i-close");
  smartBannercloseBtn .addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "none";
    const today = new Date();
    const setDays = 2;
    const expires = new Date(today.getTime() + (setDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)); // 設定 cookie 的時長為 7 天
    document.cookie = "smart_banner_close=true; expires=" + expires.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
  });
</script>										    <!-- 970*250廣告 -->

                  function subscribeConfirm() {
                    // alert($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content'));
                    if( parseInt($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content')) < 2 ) {
                        $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱');
                    } else {
                      $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱中');
                    }
                  }
                  $(document).ready(function(){
                    $('.btn-vip').click(function(){
                        location.href = '/money/order';
                    })
                  });
                  if (typeof $.cookie('udngold') === "undefined") {
                      $(".icon-user").children().click( function () {
                          if ($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content') === '') {
                            //沒url就導回首頁
                            window.location.href ='https://money.udn.com/member/member_login?site=m_money&again=y&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fmoney.udn.com%2Fmoney%2Findex';
                          } else {
                            window.location.href =$("meta[name='origion_common_url']").attr('content') + '/member/member_login?site=money&again=y&redirect=' +
                            encodeURIComponent($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content'));
                          }
                      })
                  } else {
                      $(".icon-user").children().removeClass("i-money-user-2");
                      $(".icon-user").children().addClass("i-money-user-out-2");
                  }
              </script>

													crossDomain:true,

													},

        $(document).ready(function(){
            function searchSubmit(e) {
              e.preventDefault();
              var key = $('.money-search__wrapper .search__input').val();
              var url = '/search/result/1001/';
              location.href = url + encodeURIComponent(key)
            }
            $(".money-search__wrapper .i-money-search").on("click",searchSubmit);
            $('.money-search__wrapper .search__form').on('submit', searchSubmit);
        });
      </script>

「多空狙擊手」莊佳螢上周投資組合報酬率漲1.03%；投資標的中，譜瑞-KY（4966）漲5.4%，表現最佳，高技跌2.7%，表現不如預期。

譜瑞-KY受惠於高速傳輸介面規格朝PC...                </p>
                <time>2023-10-21 23:42</time>
              </a>
            </div>
          </li>
                          </ul>

<script>
    var adTimerId ;
    var count = 0;
    function checkDom() {
        var el = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe');
        if (el.length > 0) {
            let setWidth = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0').width();
            $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe').attr('width', setWidth)
            clearInterval(adTimerId );
        } else {
            // 如果為空，表示 dom 不存在，則在控制台輸出訊息
            count++;
            if (count == 10) {
                clearInterval(adTimerId);
            }
        }
    }
    adTimerId = setInterval(checkDom, 1000);
</script>

<!-- 以下原架構為去除bottomAd 那層 -->
<div id="bottomAd">
  <div id="google_ad">
    <div id='moneyAD-Mobile-sticky' style='width:320px;'>
     <script>
       googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('moneyAD-Mobile-sticky'); });
     </script>
   </div>

<script>
var isShow = true;
$(document).ready(function(){ 
        var adDiv = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').css('display');
        // var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').find('iframe').length;//20211129之前
	$(window).scroll(function(){
        var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd iframe').length;//20211129之後
		var Wheight = $(window).scrollTop();
                var adHeight = $('#bottomAd').height()
		if (Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight>=100) {
			$('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').addClass('show');
                        
		}else if(Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight < 100) {
                       $('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                       $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
                }else {
			$('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
		}
                
                if(adHeight < 100) {
                  //console.log('adHeight:' + adHeight)
                $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
        }

	});

        $('.closeBtn').click(function(){
            $('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
            $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
            isShow = false;
        });	
});

// 針對特殊廣告 讓自訂的closeButton 不出現
$(window).on('load',function(){
      if($('#MediaBook-AD2').length > 0 || $('.innity-apps-pull-up-touch-layer').length > 0) {
         $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
         isShow = false;
      }
       
});
</script>

<script>
//用js 添加class 給CMS 版位
  var url = new URL(location.href);
  if (url.pathname.indexOf('vipindex') > -1) {
    // console.log('你是vip 你真棒');
    $('#footer section.toggle-list').addClass('sitemap--bg-dark')
  }

$(document).ready(function() {
  $.fn.center = function () {
    this.css("position", "absolute");
    this.css("top", Math.max(0, (($(window).height() - this.innerHeight()) / 2) + $(window).scrollTop()) + "px");
    this.css("left", Math.max(0, (($(window).width() - this.outerWidth()) / 2) + $(window).scrollLeft()) + "px");
    return this;
  }

  $.fn.show_box = function (url) {
    $('#show_box').stop(true, true).load(url, function () {

      $('#show_box .close').click(function () {
        $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
      });

    });
    $('#show_box').fadeIn();
  }

    //閒置頁面
    timeoutHandle = null;
    if ($(window).width() > 749) {
      idleState = false;
      idleWait = 300000; /* 5'm */
      if (location.href.indexOf('idlePageTest') > -1) {
        idleWait = 5000; /* 5's */
      }
      $('body').bind('mousemove click keydown scroll', function () {
        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
        timeoutHandle = setTimeout(function () {

          var channel_id = $('meta[name="channel_id"]').attr('content');
          var cate_id = $('meta[name="cate_id"]').attr('content');
          $(this).show_box('/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id);
          ga('money.send', 'event', 'Idlepage_' + channel_id, 'popup', { 'page': '/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id });

        }, idleWait);
      });
      $('body').trigger("mousemove");
    }

    $(window).on("scroll", function (e) {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
    
    $(document).on("pagecreate tap scrollstart", function () {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
});
</script>

<!-- 錨點移動功能 -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
    function hashScroll() {
      target = $(window.location.hash);
      event.preventDefault();
          $('html, body').animate({
              scrollTop: target.offset().top - 50
          }, 500);

      if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
      $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      setTimeout(function() {
      $( window ).scroll(function() {
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "flex");
      });
      }, 1000);
    }
    document.onreadystatechange = subSomething;//當頁面載入狀態改變的時候執行這個方法.
    function subSomething() {
      if(document.readyState == 'complete') {
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0) {
          hashScroll()
        }
      } //當頁面載入狀態
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('hashchange', function() {
      hashScroll()
  }, false);
</script>

		}

		<script>
  /**
   * 訂閱及買斷補服務代碼給 cas
   */
  function setServiceForCas() {
    var udngold = GetCkValue("udngold");
    var udnland = GetCkValue("udnland");
    var services = GetCkValue("services");
    if(udngold !== "" && udnland !== "" && services !== "") {
      var sub_check = GetCkValue("sub_check");
      var buyout_check = GetCkValue("buyout_check");
      if(sub_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/sub", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
      if(buyout_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/buyout", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
    }
  }

  $(document).ready(function() {
    // setServiceForCas();
  });
</script>

<!-- Data Layer -->
<script>
    function getCookie(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
    }
    var dataLayer = dataLayer || [];
    var _ga = getCookie("_ga");
    var google_id = "__";
    if (typeof _ga !== "undefined") {
        var _gaA = _ga.split(".");
        google_id = _gaA[2]+'.'+_gaA[3];
        google_id = google_id.replace(/.undefined/ig, "");
    }
     var user_id = GetCkValue("udnmember");
    if (typeof user_id === "undefined") user_id = ""; 

    if (GetCkValue('udngold') != '' && GetCkValue('udnland') == '') {
        $.ajax({
            type: "GET",
            url: "/money/ajax_check_member/udngold_decode",
            data: {udngold : encodeURIComponent($.cookie("udngold"))},
            success: function(jdata) {
                if (jdata !== "") {
                    Date.prototype.addDays = function(days) {
                        this.setDate(this.getDate() + days);
                        return this;
                    }
                    udnland_expires = new Date().addDays(365).toUTCString();
                    document.cookie="udnland=" + jdata + "; expires=" + udnland_expires + "; domain=.udn.com; path=/";
                }
            }
        });
    }

    var user_id = getCookie("udnland");
    if (typeof user_id === 'undefined') user_id = '';
    var etu_id = GetCkValue("__eruid");
    var gold_id = getCookie("udngold");
    if (typeof gold_id === 'undefined') gold_id = 'noset';


    dataLayer = [{
        "etu_id": etu_id || undefined,
        "user_id" : GetCkValue('udnland') || undefined,
        "google_id": google_id || undefined,
        "cat": ['money','cms','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果'] || undefined,
        "content_tag": ""|| undefined,
                "words" : 0,
        'product_category' : 'ednrr',
        "publication_date": '' || undefined,
        "content_level": ''|| undefined,
        "user_login_session": 'N' || undefined,
        "user_employee": 'N' || undefined,
        "custom_name": '' || undefined,
        "auth_type": '未登入' || '未登入'
    }];

</script>
<!-- End Data Layer -->

<script>
// 針對產業鏈 跟台股明星賽也要多加權限呼叫 影響付費牆彈出
if (user_id != '' && typeof user_id !== 'undefined' || (window.location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1)) {
    fetch('/api/get_AuthType', {//本機
    method:'POST',
    headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({"account":user_id,"udngold":gold_id})
    })
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(function(data) {

    // 添加會員權限近meta
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="' + data.identity +'">');

    // 台股擂台 產業資料庫添加付費牆(排除產業資料庫首頁)
    if((location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1 || location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1) && location.href.indexOf('industry/index') < 0 ) {
        paywall_active(); // scritp in paywall_cate 
    }
    
    if(typeof subscribeConfirm === 'function') {
        subscribeConfirm(); // scritp in top
    }

    // 排除訂戶 google DFP console error
    if(data.identity >= 2) {
        var googletag = {};
    }
    });
} else {
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="0">');
}
</script>

<script>
    $(function() {
        if($.cookie('udnland') !== undefined && $("meta[name='identity']").attr("content") === '2') {
            var requestURL = "/api/user_behavior";
            var moneydataJSON = {};
            moneydataJSON["udnland"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udnland'));
            moneydataJSON["udngold"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udngold'));
            moneydataJSON["channel_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='channel_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["art_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='art_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='cate_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["sub_cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='sub_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["title"] = encodeURI($("h1#story_art_title").html() || "_");
            moneydataJSON["tag"] = encodeURI($("meta[name='news_keywords']").attr("content") || "_");
            moneydataJSON["user_agent"] = encodeURI(navigator.userAgent);
            $.ajax({
                url: requestURL,
                data: JSON.stringify(moneydataJSON),
                type: "POST",
                dataType: "json",
                contentType: "application/json;charset=utf-8",
                success: function(returnData){},
                error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError){}
            });
        }
    });
</script>

<!-- 20180718 要塞進DFP key-value 的client id -->
<script>
	//function getCookie(name) {
	//	var value = "; " + document.cookie;
	//	var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
	//	if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
	// }
	//var clientId = getCookie('_ga').split('.')[2]+'.'+getCookie('_ga').split('.')[3];

// 修正版20230826
function getCookie(name) {
  var value = "; " + document.cookie;
  var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
  if (parts.length == 2) {
    return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  } else {
    return null; // 或者返回其他預設值
  }
}

var gaCookie = getCookie('_ga');
if (gaCookie) {
  var clientId = gaCookie.split('.')[2] + '.' + gaCookie.split('.')[3];
} 

</script>

<!-- 20230723 針對覆蓋式 browser 不同時 的不同呼叫時機 -->
<script>
    function debounceForAds(func, wait, immediate) {
        var timeout ;
        return function executedFunction() {
        var context = this;
        var args = arguments;
        var later = function() {
            timeout = null;
            if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
        };

        var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
        
        clearTimeout(timeout);

        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
        if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
        };
    };
    // 添加瀏覽器判斷
    var isChromium = window.chrome;
    var winNav = window.navigator;
    var vendorName = winNav.vendor;
    var isOpera = typeof window.opr !== "undefined";
    var isIEedge = winNav.userAgent.indexOf("Edg") > -1;
    var isIOSChrome = winNav.userAgent.match("CriOS");
    var isGoogle = false;
    var showCoverAds = false;
   
    if (isIOSChrome) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else if(
      isChromium !== null &&
      typeof isChromium !== "undefined" &&
      vendorName === "Google Inc." &&
      isOpera === false &&
      isIEedge === false
    ) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else { 
      // 非google 直接跳出
      showCoverAds = true;
    }
</script>

<!-- PMP 1 20180918起 -->
  <!-- This is the Header script for Header Bidding -->
  <script>
  //This is where ucfunnel adunit is defined

    var HEADER_TIMEOUT = 1000;

    var adUnits = [{
    code: 'div-gpt-ad-1530270190918-0',
    sizes: [[970, 250]],
    bids: [{
        bidder: 'ucfunnel',
        params: {
          adid: "ad-AA776974DBEAB33BC8398BD23834A27B"        //String - required
        }
      }
    ]
  }];

    var hbjs = hbjs || {};
    hbjs.que = hbjs.que || [];
  </script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->
    <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn.aralego.net/hbjs/v2/headerbid.js" async></script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->

  <script>
    var HASAD = 0;
    var secret = []
    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
    });

    hbjs.que.push(function() {
        hbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);
        hbjs.requestBids({
            bidsBackHandler: sendAdserverRequest
        });
    });

    function sendAdserverRequest() {
      var highestCpmBids = hbjs.getHighestCpmBids();
        if (highestCpmBids.length > 0) {
          HASAD = 1;
        }
        highestCpmBids.forEach(bid => {
          if (bid.ad.indexOf("hasSecret") > 0) {
            secret.push(bid.adUnitCode);
          }
        })
        if (hbjs.adserverRequestSent) return;
        hbjs.adserverRequestSent = true;
        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            hbjs.que.push(function() {
                hbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
                googletag.pubads().refresh();
            });
        });
    }

    setTimeout(function() {
        sendAdserverRequest();
    }, HEADER_TIMEOUT);

  </script>
<!-- PMP 1 20180918止 -->

    var coverAdsUnLoaded = true; 
    var coverAdsSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/320*480-Cover-1', [[320, 480], 'fluid'], 'div-gpt-ad-1496826774110-0').defineSizeMapping(mobileonly_320x480_video2023);

    if (showCoverAds) {
        coverAdsSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
        coverAdsUnLoaded = false;
        googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotResponseReceived", (event) => {
           const slot = event.slot;
           slotInformatio = slot.getResponseInformation();
           //console.log(slotInformatio.creativeId)
           if (slotInformatio.creativeId  === 138449816783 )
             {
               document.querySelector('.overlay-container').style.display = 'none';
             }
          //console.log("Ad response for slot", slot.getSlotElementId(), "received.");
       });
    } else {
        // google 滾動跳出
        //if (isGoogle) console.log('Is Google Chrome');

        $(window).on('scroll', debounceForAds(function() {

          let scrollDistance =  $(window).scrollTop();
            if (scrollDistance > 400 && isGoogle && coverAdsUnLoaded) {
                googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                    coverAdsSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
                    // console.log("check console");
                    // console.log(coverAdsSlot.getSlotElementId())
                    googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1496826774110-0');
                    googletag.pubads().refresh([coverAdsSlot]);
                    coverAdsUnLoaded = false;

                    googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotResponseReceived", (event) => {
                        const slot = event.slot;
                        slotInformatio = slot.getResponseInformation();
                        //console.log(slotInformatio.creativeId)
                        if (slotInformatio.creativeId  === 138449816783 )
                         {
                            document.querySelector('.overlay-container').style.display = 'none';
                        }
                        //console.log("Ad response for slot", slot.getSlotElementId(), "received.");
                    });

                });
            }
        },100));
    }

<!--起-->
/* googletag slotRenderEnded event listener */
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
var slot = event.slot;
var size = event.size;

// console.log(slot.getAdUnitPath());
// console.log(slot.getSlotElementId());
// console.log(size);

if (slot.getAdUnitPath() == '/129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/320*480-Cover-1') {
var popupEl = document.querySelector('.overlay-container');

if (popupEl != null && size[0] == 1 && size[1] == 1) {
popupEl.style.display = 'none';
}
}
// 內文廣告 排除lab 架構
if(slot === slot2 && window.location.href.indexOf('lab7') < 0){
document.getElementById('before').style.display = 'inline-block';
document.getElementById('after').style.display = 'inline-block';
}

});
<!--止-->

  });
</script>

<script>
var MD5 = function(d){result = M(V(Y(X(d),8*d.length)));return result.toLowerCase()};function M(d){for(var md5_gg(d,_,m,f,r,i,n){return md5_cmn(_&f|m&~f,d,_,r,i,n)}function md5_hh(d,_,m,f,r,i,n){return md5_cmn(_^m^f,d,_,r,i,n)}function md5_ii(d,_,m,f,r,i,n){return md5_cmn(m^(_|~f),d,_,r,i,n)}function safe_add(d,_){var m=(65535&d)+(65535&_);return(d>>16)+(_>>16)+(m>>16)<<16|65535&m}function bit_rol(d,_){return d<<_|d>>>32-_}
//var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
//var myParam = urlParams.get('show_active');
$.urlParam = function(name){
    var results = new RegExp('[\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)').exec(window.location.href);
    if (results == null){
       return null;
    }
    else {
       return decodeURI(results[1]) || 0;
    }
}
var myParam = $.urlParam('show_active');
var udngold = GetCkValue('udngold');
var udnmember = GetCkValue('udnmember');
var um2 = GetCkValue('um2');
var userAction = ''
if(udngold != '' && myParam == 'y')

//index use cookie save userAction 
$(window).ready(function(){
	$('#index_ad_2  a.more').click(function(){
		 if($(this).parent().text().indexOf('大盤走勢') != -1){
			setCookie('userAction','event=systex_market')
		 }
	 });
});




function is_useServiceNew() {
	if (GetCkValue('userAction') != ''){
		userAction = '?'+decodeURIComponent(GetCkValue('userAction'));
		alert(userAction)
	}
	$.confirm({
		title: '',
		content: '享受暢讀權益，啟用經濟日報會員服務',
		boxWidth: '285px',
		useBootstrap: false,
		buttons: {
			confirm: {
				text: '啟用meta',
				action: function () {
					$.ajax({
						type : 'POST',
						url : '/api/v1/member/activeMoneyMember'+ userAction,
						async:false,
						xhrFields: {withCredentials: true},
						crossDomain:true,
						success : function (response){
							if(response['success'] == true) {
								alert('啟用成功');
								window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
							} else {
								alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							}
						},
						error : function(){
							alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
						}
					}); // end
				}
			},
			cancel: {
				text: '稍後再說',
				action: function () {}
			}
		}
	});
}
</script>

<script>
  if (window.innerWidth < 1024 && document.cookie.indexOf("smart_banner_close=true") < 0) {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "flex";

    var style = document.createElement('style');
    var css = document.createTextNode('.drop-down-mask { top : 170px; }');
    style.appendChild(css);
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }

  const downloadBtn = document.getElementById("download_app_btn");
  downloadBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    let url = "https://edn.page.link/ednappdl2023";
    window.location.href = url ;
  });

  const smartBannercloseBtn = document.querySelector(".appbanner_btns .i-close");
  smartBannercloseBtn .addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "none";
    const today = new Date();
    const setDays = 2;
    const expires = new Date(today.getTime() + (setDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)); // 設定 cookie 的時長為 7 天
    document.cookie = "smart_banner_close=true; expires=" + expires.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
  });
</script>										    <!-- 970*250廣告 -->

                  function subscribeConfirm() {
                    // alert($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content'));
                    if( parseInt($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content')) < 2 ) {
                        $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱');
                    } else {
                      $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱中');
                    }

                    $('.btn-vip').click(function(){
                        location.href = '/money/order';
                    })
                  });

                      $(".icon-user").children().click( function () {
                          if ($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content') === '') {
                            //沒url就導回首頁
                            window.location.href ='https://money.udn.com/member/member_login?site=m_money&again=y&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fmoney.udn.com%2Fmoney%2Findex';
                          } else {
                            window.location.href =$("meta[name='origion_common_url']").attr('content') + '/member/member_login?site=money&again=y&redirect=' +
                            encodeURIComponent($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content'));
                          }
                      })
                  } else {
                      $(".icon-user").children().removeClass("i-money-user-2");
                      $(".icon-user").children().addClass("i-money-user-out-2");
                  }

      <script>
        $(document).ready(function(){
            function searchSubmit(e) {
              e.preventDefault();
              var key = $('.money-search__wrapper .search__input').val();
              var url = '/search/result/1001/';
              location.href = url + encodeURIComponent(key)
            }
            $(".money-search__wrapper .i-money-search").on("click",searchSubmit);
            $('.money-search__wrapper .search__form').on('submit', searchSubmit);
        });
      </script>

            <div class="story__content ">

<script>
    var adTimerId ;
    var count = 0;
    function checkDom() {
        var el = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe');
        if (el.length > 0) {
            let setWidth = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0').width();
            $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe').attr('width', setWidth)
            clearInterval(adTimerId );
        } else {
            // 如果為空，表示 dom 不存在，則在控制台輸出訊息
            count++;
            if (count == 10) {
                clearInterval(adTimerId);
            }
        }
    }
    adTimerId = setInterval(checkDom, 1000);
</script>

console.log('test scroll');
   window.scrollTo({top: window.scrollY + 1});
  }
});
</script>

<!-- /129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/money-Mobile-float -->
<!-- 以下原架構為去除bottomAd 那層 -->
<div id="bottomAd">
  <div id="google_ad">
    <div id='moneyAD-Mobile-sticky' style='width:320px;'>
     <script>
       googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('moneyAD-Mobile-sticky'); });
     </script>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="closeBtn"></div>
</div>



<script>
var isShow = true;
$(document).ready(function(){ 
        var adDiv = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').css('display');
        // var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').find('iframe').length;//20211129之前
	$(window).scroll(function(){
        var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd iframe').length;//20211129之後
		var Wheight = $(window).scrollTop();
                var adHeight = $('#bottomAd').height()
		if (Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight>=100) {
			$('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').addClass('show');
                        
		}else if(Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight < 100) {
                       $('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                       $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
                }else {
			$('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
		}
                
                if(adHeight < 100) {
                  //console.log('adHeight:' + adHeight)
                $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
        }

	});

        $('.closeBtn').click(function(){
            $('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
            $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
            isShow = false;
        });	
});

// 針對特殊廣告 讓自訂的closeButton 不出現
$(window).on('load',function(){
      if($('#MediaBook-AD2').length > 0 || $('.innity-apps-pull-up-touch-layer').length > 0) {
         $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
         isShow = false;
      }
       
});
</script>

<script>
//用js 添加class 給CMS 版位
  var url = new URL(location.href);
  if (url.pathname.indexOf('vipindex') > -1) {
    // console.log('你是vip 你真棒');
    $('#footer section.toggle-list').addClass('sitemap--bg-dark')
  }

$(document).ready(function() {
  $.fn.center = function () {
    this.css("position", "absolute");
    this.css("top", Math.max(0, (($(window).height() - this.innerHeight()) / 2) + $(window).scrollTop()) + "px");
    this.css("left", Math.max(0, (($(window).width() - this.outerWidth()) / 2) + $(window).scrollLeft()) + "px");
    return this;
  }

  $.fn.show_box = function (url) {
    $('#show_box').stop(true, true).load(url, function () {

      $('#show_box .close').click(function () {
        $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
      });

    });
    $('#show_box').fadeIn();
  }

    //閒置頁面
    timeoutHandle = null;
    if ($(window).width() > 749) {
      idleState = false;
      idleWait = 300000; /* 5'm */
      if (location.href.indexOf('idlePageTest') > -1) {
        idleWait = 5000; /* 5's */
      }
      $('body').bind('mousemove click keydown scroll', function () {
        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
        timeoutHandle = setTimeout(function () {

          var channel_id = $('meta[name="channel_id"]').attr('content');
          var cate_id = $('meta[name="cate_id"]').attr('content');
          $(this).show_box('/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id);
          ga('money.send', 'event', 'Idlepage_' + channel_id, 'popup', { 'page': '/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id });

        }, idleWait);
      });
      $('body').trigger("mousemove");
    }

    $(window).on("scroll", function (e) {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
    
    $(document).on("pagecreate tap scrollstart", function () {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
});
</script>

<!-- 錨點移動功能 -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
    function hashScroll() {
      target = $(window.location.hash);
      event.preventDefault();
          $('html, body').animate({
              scrollTop: target.offset().top - 50
          }, 500);

      if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
      $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      setTimeout(function() {
      $( window ).scroll(function() {
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "flex");
      });
      }, 1000);
    }
    document.onreadystatechange = subSomething;//當頁面載入狀態改變的時候執行這個方法.
    function subSomething() {
      if(document.readyState == 'complete') {
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0) {
          hashScroll()
        }
      } //當頁面載入狀態
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('hashchange', function() {
      hashScroll()
  }, false);
</script>

		<script>
  /**
   * 訂閱及買斷補服務代碼給 cas
   */
  function setServiceForCas() {
    var udngold = GetCkValue("udngold");
    var udnland = GetCkValue("udnland");
    var services = GetCkValue("services");
    if(udngold !== "" && udnland !== "" && services !== "") {
      var sub_check = GetCkValue("sub_check");
      var buyout_check = GetCkValue("buyout_check");
      if(sub_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/sub", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
      if(buyout_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/buyout", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
    }
  }

  $(document).ready(function() {
    // setServiceForCas();
  });
</script>

<script>
    function getCookie(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
    }
    var dataLayer = dataLayer || [];
    var _ga = getCookie("_ga");
    var google_id = "__";
    if (typeof _ga !== "undefined") {
        var _gaA = _ga.split(".");
        google_id = _gaA[2]+'.'+_gaA[3];
        google_id = google_id.replace(/.undefined/ig, "");
    }
     var user_id = GetCkValue("udnmember");
    if (typeof user_id === "undefined") user_id = ""; 

    if (GetCkValue('udngold') != '' && GetCkValue('udnland') == '') {
        $.ajax({
            type: "GET",
            url: "/money/ajax_check_member/udngold_decode",
            data: {udngold : encodeURIComponent($.cookie("udngold"))},
            success: function(jdata) {
                if (jdata !== "") {
                    Date.prototype.addDays = function(days) {
                        this.setDate(this.getDate() + days);
                        return this;
                    }
                    udnland_expires = new Date().addDays(365).toUTCString();
                    document.cookie="udnland=" + jdata + "; expires=" + udnland_expires + "; domain=.udn.com; path=/";
                }
            }
        });
    }

    var user_id = getCookie("udnland");
    if (typeof user_id === 'undefined') user_id = '';
    var etu_id = GetCkValue("__eruid");
    var gold_id = getCookie("udngold");
    if (typeof gold_id === 'undefined') gold_id = 'noset';


    dataLayer = [{
        "etu_id": etu_id || undefined,
        "user_id" : GetCkValue('udnland') || undefined,
        "google_id": google_id || undefined,
        "cat": ['money','cms','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果'] || undefined,
        "content_tag": ""|| undefined,
                "words" : 0,
        'product_category' : 'ednrr',
        "publication_date": '' || undefined,
        "content_level": ''|| undefined,
        "user_login_session": 'N' || undefined,
        "user_employee": 'N' || undefined,
        "custom_name": '' || undefined,
        "auth_type": '未登入' || '未登入'
    }];

</script>
<!-- End Data Layer -->

<script>
// 針對產業鏈 跟台股明星賽也要多加權限呼叫 影響付費牆彈出
if (user_id != '' && typeof user_id !== 'undefined' || (window.location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1)) {
    fetch('/api/get_AuthType', {//本機
    method:'POST',
    headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({"account":user_id,"udngold":gold_id})
    })
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(function(data) {

    // 添加會員權限近meta
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="' + data.identity +'">');

    // 台股擂台 產業資料庫添加付費牆(排除產業資料庫首頁)
    if((location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1 || location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1) && location.href.indexOf('industry/index') < 0 ) {
        paywall_active(); // scritp in paywall_cate 
    }
    
    if(typeof subscribeConfirm === 'function') {
        subscribeConfirm(); // scritp in top
    }

    // 排除訂戶 google DFP console error
    if(data.identity >= 2) {
        var googletag = {};
    }
    });
} else {
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="0">');
}
</script>

<script>
    $(function() {
        if($.cookie('udnland') !== undefined && $("meta[name='identity']").attr("content") === '2') {
            var requestURL = "/api/user_behavior";
            var moneydataJSON = {};
            moneydataJSON["udnland"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udnland'));
            moneydataJSON["udngold"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udngold'));
            moneydataJSON["channel_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='channel_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["art_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='art_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='cate_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["sub_cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='sub_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["title"] = encodeURI($("h1#story_art_title").html() || "_");
            moneydataJSON["tag"] = encodeURI($("meta[name='news_keywords']").attr("content") || "_");
            moneydataJSON["user_agent"] = encodeURI(navigator.userAgent);
            $.ajax({
                url: requestURL,
                data: JSON.stringify(moneydataJSON),
                type: "POST",
                dataType: "json",
                contentType: "application/json;charset=utf-8",
                success: function(returnData){},
                error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError){}
            });
        }
    });
</script>

<!-- 20180718 要塞進DFP key-value 的client id -->
<script>
	//function getCookie(name) {
	//	var value = "; " + document.cookie;
	//	var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
	//	if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
	// }
	//var clientId = getCookie('_ga').split('.')[2]+'.'+getCookie('_ga').split('.')[3];

// 修正版20230826
function getCookie(name) {
  var value = "; " + document.cookie;
  var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
  if (parts.length == 2) {
    return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  } else {
    return null; // 或者返回其他預設值
  }
}

var gaCookie = getCookie('_ga');
if (gaCookie) {
  var clientId = gaCookie.split('.')[2] + '.' + gaCookie.split('.')[3];
} 

</script>

<!-- 20230723 針對覆蓋式 browser 不同時 的不同呼叫時機 -->
<script>
    function debounceForAds(func, wait, immediate) {
        var timeout ;
        return function executedFunction() {
        var context = this;
        var args = arguments;
        var later = function() {
            timeout = null;
            if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
        };

        var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
        
        clearTimeout(timeout);

        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
        if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
        };
    };
    // 添加瀏覽器判斷
    var isChromium = window.chrome;
    var winNav = window.navigator;
    var vendorName = winNav.vendor;
    var isOpera = typeof window.opr !== "undefined";
    var isIEedge = winNav.userAgent.indexOf("Edg") > -1;
    var isIOSChrome = winNav.userAgent.match("CriOS");
    var isGoogle = false;
    var showCoverAds = false;
   
    if (isIOSChrome) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else if(
      isChromium !== null &&
      typeof isChromium !== "undefined" &&
      vendorName === "Google Inc." &&
      isOpera === false &&
      isIEedge === false
    ) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else { 
      // 非google 直接跳出
      showCoverAds = true;
    }
</script>

<!-- PMP 1 20180918起 -->
  <!-- This is the Header script for Header Bidding -->
  <script>
  //This is where ucfunnel adunit is defined

    var HEADER_TIMEOUT = 1000;

    var adUnits = [{
    code: 'div-gpt-ad-1530270190918-0',
    sizes: [[970, 250]],
    bids: [{
        bidder: 'ucfunnel',
        params: {
          adid: "ad-AA776974DBEAB33BC8398BD23834A27B"        //String - required
        }
      }
    ]
  }];

    var hbjs = hbjs || {};
    hbjs.que = hbjs.que || [];
  </script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->
    <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn.aralego.net/hbjs/v2/headerbid.js" async></script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->

  <script>
    var HASAD = 0;
    var secret = []
    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
    });

    hbjs.que.push(function() {
        hbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);
        hbjs.requestBids({
            bidsBackHandler: sendAdserverRequest
        });
    });

    function sendAdserverRequest() {
      var highestCpmBids = hbjs.getHighestCpmBids();
        if (highestCpmBids.length > 0) {
          HASAD = 1;
        }
        highestCpmBids.forEach(bid => {
          if (bid.ad.indexOf("hasSecret") > 0) {
            secret.push(bid.adUnitCode);
          }
        })
        if (hbjs.adserverRequestSent) return;
        hbjs.adserverRequestSent = true;
        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            hbjs.que.push(function() {
                hbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
                googletag.pubads().refresh();
            });
        });
    }

    setTimeout(function() {
        sendAdserverRequest();
    }, HEADER_TIMEOUT);

  </script>
<!-- PMP 1 20180918止 -->

    var coverAdsUnLoaded = true; 
    var coverAdsSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/320*480-Cover-1', [[320, 480], 'fluid'], 'div-gpt-ad-1496826774110-0').defineSizeMapping(mobileonly_320x480_video2023);

    if (showCoverAds) {
        coverAdsSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
        coverAdsUnLoaded = false;
        googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotResponseReceived", (event) => {
           const slot = event.slot;
           slotInformatio = slot.getResponseInformation();
           //console.log(slotInformatio.creativeId)
           if (slotInformatio.creativeId  === 138449816783 )
             {
               document.querySelector('.overlay-container').style.display = 'none';
             }

        // google 滾動跳出
        //if (isGoogle) console.log('Is Google Chrome');

        $(window).on('scroll', debounceForAds(function() {

          let scrollDistance =  $(window).scrollTop();
            if (scrollDistance > 400 && isGoogle && coverAdsUnLoaded) {
                googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                    coverAdsSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
                    // console.log("check console");
                    // console.log(coverAdsSlot.getSlotElementId())
                    googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1496826774110-0');
                    googletag.pubads().refresh([coverAdsSlot]);
                    coverAdsUnLoaded = false;

                    googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotResponseReceived", (event) => {
                        const slot = event.slot;
                        slotInformatio = slot.getResponseInformation();
                        //console.log(slotInformatio.creativeId)
                        if (slotInformatio.creativeId  === 138449816783 )
                         {
                            document.querySelector('.overlay-container').style.display = 'none';
                        }
                        //console.log("Ad response for slot", slot.getSlotElementId(), "received.");
                    });

                });
            }
        },100));

/* googletag slotRenderEnded event listener */
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
var slot = event.slot;
var size = event.size;

// console.log(slot.getAdUnitPath());
// console.log(slot.getSlotElementId());
// console.log(size);

if (slot.getAdUnitPath() == '/129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/320*480-Cover-1') {
var popupEl = document.querySelector('.overlay-container');

if (popupEl != null && size[0] == 1 && size[1] == 1) {
popupEl.style.display = 'none';
}
}
// 內文廣告 排除lab 架構
if(slot === slot2 && window.location.href.indexOf('lab7') < 0){
document.getElementById('before').style.display = 'inline-block';
document.getElementById('after').style.display = 'inline-block';
}

});
<!--止-->

  });
</script>

//var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
//var myParam = urlParams.get('show_active');
$.urlParam = function(name){
    var results = new RegExp('[\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)').exec(window.location.href);
    if (results == null){
       return null;
    }
    else {
       return decodeURI(results[1]) || 0;
    }
}
var myParam = $.urlParam('show_active');

//index use cookie save userAction 
$(window).ready(function(){
	$('#index_ad_2  a.more').click(function(){
		 if($(this).parent().text().indexOf('大盤走勢') != -1){
			setCookie('userAction','event=systex_market')
		 }
	 });
});




function is_useServiceNew() {
	if (GetCkValue('userAction') != ''){
		userAction = '?'+decodeURIComponent(GetCkValue('userAction'));
		alert(userAction)
	}
	$.confirm({
		title: '',
		content: '享受暢讀權益，啟用經濟日報會員服務',
		boxWidth: '285px',
		useBootstrap: false,
		buttons: {
			confirm: {
				text: '啟用meta',
				action: function () {
					$.ajax({
						type : 'POST',
						url : '/api/v1/member/activeMoneyMember'+ userAction,
						async:false,
						xhrFields: {withCredentials: true},
						crossDomain:true,
						success : function (response){
							if(response['success'] == true) {
								alert('啟用成功');
								window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
							} else {
								alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							}
						},
						error : function(){
							alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
						}
					}); // end
				}
			},
			cancel: {
				text: '稍後再說',
				action: function () {}
			}
		}
	});
}

<script>
  if (window.innerWidth < 1024 && document.cookie.indexOf("smart_banner_close=true") < 0) {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "flex";

    var style = document.createElement('style');
    var css = document.createTextNode('.drop-down-mask { top : 170px; }');
    style.appendChild(css);
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }

  const downloadBtn = document.getElementById("download_app_btn");
  downloadBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    let url = "https://edn.page.link/ednappdl2023";
    window.location.href = url ;
  });

  const smartBannercloseBtn = document.querySelector(".appbanner_btns .i-close");
  smartBannercloseBtn .addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "none";
    const today = new Date();
    const setDays = 2;
    const expires = new Date(today.getTime() + (setDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)); // 設定 cookie 的時長為 7 天
    document.cookie = "smart_banner_close=true; expires=" + expires.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
  });
</script>										    <!-- 970*250廣告 -->

                  function subscribeConfirm() {
                    // alert($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content'));
                    if( parseInt($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content')) < 2 ) {
                        $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱');
                    } else {
                      $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱中');
                    }
                  }
                  $(document).ready(function(){
                    $('.btn-vip').click(function(){
                        location.href = '/money/order';
                    })
                  });
                  if (typeof $.cookie('udngold') === "undefined") {
                      $(".icon-user").children().click( function () {
                          if ($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content') === '') {
                            //沒url就導回首頁
                            window.location.href ='https://money.udn.com/member/member_login?site=m_money&again=y&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fmoney.udn.com%2Fmoney%2Findex';
                          } else {
                            window.location.href =$("meta[name='origion_common_url']").attr('content') + '/member/member_login?site=money&again=y&redirect=' +
                            encodeURIComponent($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content'));
                          }
                      })
                  } else {
                      $(".icon-user").children().removeClass("i-money-user-2");
                      $(".icon-user").children().addClass("i-money-user-out-2");
                  }
              </script>
              <ul class="header-user__list">
                <li class="header-user__item">
                  <a href="/member/member_data">
                    會員中心
                  </a>  
                </li>
                <li class="header-user__item">
                  <a href="/member/member_subscribeInfo">
                    訂閱管理
                  </a>  
                </li>
                <li class="header-user__item">
                  <a href="/member/member_questions">
                    常見問題
                  </a>  
                </li>
                <li class="header-user__item">
                  <a class="logout" href="#">
                    登出
                  </a>  
                  <script>
                    $("a.logout").click(function (e){
                      e.preventDefault();
                      $.ajax({
													type: 'POST',
													url: '/common/logout',
													async:false,
													xhrFields: {withCredentials: true},
													crossDomain:true,
													success: function (response) {
                            location.reload();
													},
													error: function() {
                            location.reload();
													}
												});
                    })
                  </script>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>

      <script>
        $(document).ready(function(){
            function searchSubmit(e) {
              e.preventDefault();
              var key = $('.money-search__wrapper .search__input').val();
              var url = '/search/result/1001/';
              location.href = url + encodeURIComponent(key)
            }
            $(".money-search__wrapper .i-money-search").on("click",searchSubmit);
            $('.money-search__wrapper .search__form').on('submit', searchSubmit);
        });
      </script>

  googletag.cmd.push(function() {

   });

<script>
    var adTimerId ;
    var count = 0;
    function checkDom() {
        var el = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe');
        if (el.length > 0) {
            let setWidth = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0').width();
            $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe').attr('width', setWidth)
            clearInterval(adTimerId );
        } else {
            // 如果為空，表示 dom 不存在，則在控制台輸出訊息
            count++;
            if (count == 10) {
                clearInterval(adTimerId);
            }
        }
    }
    adTimerId = setInterval(checkDom, 1000);
</script>

 });

  if (e.data.type === 'overlayIframeReady') {

   window.scrollTo({top: window.scrollY + 1});
  }
});
</script>

  transform: translateX(15%) rotate(4deg);
  -webkit-transform: translateX(15%) rotate(4deg);
  -moz-transform: translateX(15%) rotate(4deg);
  z-index: 1300;
}
.card-4 {
  width: 73%;
  height: 73%;
  left: unset !important; 
  top: 20%;
  transform:   translateX(19%) rotate(6deg);
  -webkit-transform: translateX(19%) rotate(6deg);
  -moz-transform: translateX(19%) rotate(6deg);
  z-index: 1200;
}
.ucf-cards.card-move-left {
  animation: card-move-to-left 0.7s;
  -webkit-animation: card-move-to-left 0.7s;
  transition: 0.7s ease-in;
  -webkit-transition: 0.7s ease-in;
}
.ucf-cards.card-move-right {
  animation: card-move-to-right 0.7s;
  -webkit-animation: card-move-to-right 0.7s;
  transition: 0.7s ease-in;
  -webkit-transition: 0.7s ease-in;
}
@keyframes card-move-to-right {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(19%) rotate(6deg) ;
  }
  80% {
    transform: translateX(120%) rotate(6deg);
    z-index: 1500;
  }
  100% {
    width: 73%;
    height: 73%;
    top: 20%;
    z-index: 1200;
    transform: translateX(19%) rotate(6deg) ;
  }
}

div.MediaBookAD2 {
    z-index: 50;
}

<!-- 以下原架構為去除bottomAd 那層 -->
<div id="bottomAd">
  <div id="google_ad">
    <div id='moneyAD-Mobile-sticky' style='width:320px;'>
     <script>
       googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('moneyAD-Mobile-sticky'); });
     </script>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="closeBtn"></div>
</div>



<script>
var isShow = true;
$(document).ready(function(){ 
        var adDiv = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').css('display');
        // var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').find('iframe').length;//20211129之前
	$(window).scroll(function(){
        var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd iframe').length;//20211129之後
		var Wheight = $(window).scrollTop();
                var adHeight = $('#bottomAd').height()
		if (Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight>=100) {
			$('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').addClass('show');
                        
		}else if(Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight < 100) {
                       $('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                       $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
                }else {
			$('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
		}
                
                if(adHeight < 100) {
                  //console.log('adHeight:' + adHeight)
                $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
        }

	});

        $('.closeBtn').click(function(){
            $('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
            $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
            isShow = false;
        });	
});

// 針對特殊廣告 讓自訂的closeButton 不出現
$(window).on('load',function(){
      if($('#MediaBook-AD2').length > 0 || $('.innity-apps-pull-up-touch-layer').length > 0) {
         $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
         isShow = false;
      }
       
});
</script>

<script>
//用js 添加class 給CMS 版位
  var url = new URL(location.href);
  if (url.pathname.indexOf('vipindex') > -1) {
    // console.log('你是vip 你真棒');

$(document).ready(function() {
  $.fn.center = function () {
    this.css("position", "absolute");
    this.css("top", Math.max(0, (($(window).height() - this.innerHeight()) / 2) + $(window).scrollTop()) + "px");
    this.css("left", Math.max(0, (($(window).width() - this.outerWidth()) / 2) + $(window).scrollLeft()) + "px");
    return this;
  }

  $.fn.show_box = function (url) {
    $('#show_box').stop(true, true).load(url, function () {

      $('#show_box .close').click(function () {
        $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
      });

    });
    $('#show_box').fadeIn();
  }

    //閒置頁面
    timeoutHandle = null;
    if ($(window).width() > 749) {
      idleState = false;
      idleWait = 300000; /* 5'm */
      if (location.href.indexOf('idlePageTest') > -1) {
        idleWait = 5000; /* 5's */
      }
      $('body').bind('mousemove click keydown scroll', function () {
        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
        timeoutHandle = setTimeout(function () {

          var channel_id = $('meta[name="channel_id"]').attr('content');
          var cate_id = $('meta[name="cate_id"]').attr('content');
          $(this).show_box('/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id);
          ga('money.send', 'event', 'Idlepage_' + channel_id, 'popup', { 'page': '/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id });

        }, idleWait);
      });
      $('body').trigger("mousemove");
    }

    $(window).on("scroll", function (e) {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
    
    $(document).on("pagecreate tap scrollstart", function () {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
});
</script>

<!-- 錨點移動功能 -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
    function hashScroll() {
      target = $(window.location.hash);
      event.preventDefault();
          $('html, body').animate({
              scrollTop: target.offset().top - 50
          }, 500);

      if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
      $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      setTimeout(function() {
      $( window ).scroll(function() {
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "flex");
      });
      }, 1000);
    }
    document.onreadystatechange = subSomething;//當頁面載入狀態改變的時候執行這個方法.
    function subSomething() {
      if(document.readyState == 'complete') {
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0) {
          hashScroll()
        }
      } //當頁面載入狀態
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('hashchange', function() {
      hashScroll()
  }, false);
</script>

		<script>
  /**
   * 訂閱及買斷補服務代碼給 cas
   */
  function setServiceForCas() {
    var udngold = GetCkValue("udngold");
    var udnland = GetCkValue("udnland");
    var services = GetCkValue("services");
    if(udngold !== "" && udnland !== "" && services !== "") {
      var sub_check = GetCkValue("sub_check");
      var buyout_check = GetCkValue("buyout_check");
      if(sub_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/sub", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
      if(buyout_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/buyout", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
    }
  }

  $(document).ready(function() {
    // setServiceForCas();
  });
</script>

<!-- Data Layer -->
<script>
    function getCookie(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
    }
    var dataLayer = dataLayer || [];
    var _ga = getCookie("_ga");
    var google_id = "__";
    if (typeof _ga !== "undefined") {
        var _gaA = _ga.split(".");
        google_id = _gaA[2]+'.'+_gaA[3];
        google_id = google_id.replace(/.undefined/ig, "");
    }
     var user_id = GetCkValue("udnmember");
    if (typeof user_id === "undefined") user_id = ""; 

    if (GetCkValue('udngold') != '' && GetCkValue('udnland') == '') {
        $.ajax({
            type: "GET",
            url: "/money/ajax_check_member/udngold_decode",
            data: {udngold : encodeURIComponent($.cookie("udngold"))},
            success: function(jdata) {
                if (jdata !== "") {
                    Date.prototype.addDays = function(days) {
                        this.setDate(this.getDate() + days);
                        return this;
                    }
                    udnland_expires = new Date().addDays(365).toUTCString();
                    document.cookie="udnland=" + jdata + "; expires=" + udnland_expires + "; domain=.udn.com; path=/";
                }
            }
        });
    }

    var user_id = getCookie("udnland");
    if (typeof user_id === 'undefined') user_id = '';
    var etu_id = GetCkValue("__eruid");
    var gold_id = getCookie("udngold");
    if (typeof gold_id === 'undefined') gold_id = 'noset';


    dataLayer = [{
        "etu_id": etu_id || undefined,
        "user_id" : GetCkValue('udnland') || undefined,
        "google_id": google_id || undefined,
        "cat": ['money','cms','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果','0,搜尋結果'] || undefined,
        "content_tag": ""|| undefined,
                "words" : 0,
        'product_category' : 'ednrr',
        "publication_date": '' || undefined,
        "content_level": ''|| undefined,
        "user_login_session": 'N' || undefined,
        "user_employee": 'N' || undefined,
        "custom_name": '' || undefined,
        "auth_type": '未登入' || '未登入'
    }];

</script>
<!-- End Data Layer -->

<!-- Data Layer Push -->
<script>
// 針對產業鏈 跟台股明星賽也要多加權限呼叫 影響付費牆彈出
if (user_id != '' && typeof user_id !== 'undefined' || (window.location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1)) {
    fetch('/api/get_AuthType', {//本機
    method:'POST',
    headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({"account":user_id,"udngold":gold_id})
    })
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(function(data) {

    // 添加會員權限近meta
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="' + data.identity +'">');

    // 台股擂台 產業資料庫添加付費牆(排除產業資料庫首頁)
    if((location.href.indexOf('stock_pk') > -1 || location.href.indexOf('industry') > -1) && location.href.indexOf('industry/index') < 0 ) {
        paywall_active(); // scritp in paywall_cate 
    }
    
    if(typeof subscribeConfirm === 'function') {
        subscribeConfirm(); // scritp in top
    }

    // 排除訂戶 google DFP console error
    if(data.identity >= 2) {
        var googletag = {};
    }
    });
} else {
    $("head").append('<meta name="identity" content="0">');
}
</script>

<script>
    $(function() {
        if($.cookie('udnland') !== undefined && $("meta[name='identity']").attr("content") === '2') {
            var requestURL = "/api/user_behavior";
            var moneydataJSON = {};
            moneydataJSON["udnland"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udnland'));
            moneydataJSON["udngold"] = encodeURI($.cookie('udngold'));
            moneydataJSON["channel_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='channel_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["art_id"] = parseInt($("meta[name='art_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='cate_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["sub_cate"] = parseInt($("meta[name='sub_id']").attr("content"));
            moneydataJSON["title"] = encodeURI($("h1#story_art_title").html() || "_");
            moneydataJSON["tag"] = encodeURI($("meta[name='news_keywords']").attr("content") || "_");
            moneydataJSON["user_agent"] = encodeURI(navigator.userAgent);
            $.ajax({
                url: requestURL,
                data: JSON.stringify(moneydataJSON),
                type: "POST",
                dataType: "json",
                contentType: "application/json;charset=utf-8",
                success: function(returnData){},
                error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError){}
            });
        }
    });
</script>

<!-- 20180718 要塞進DFP key-value 的client id -->
<script>
	//function getCookie(name) {
	//	var value = "; " + document.cookie;
	//	var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
	//	if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
	// }
	//var clientId = getCookie('_ga').split('.')[2]+'.'+getCookie('_ga').split('.')[3];

// 修正版20230826
function getCookie(name) {
  var value = "; " + document.cookie;
  var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
  if (parts.length == 2) {
    return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  } else {
    return null; // 或者返回其他預設值
  }
}

var gaCookie = getCookie('_ga');
if (gaCookie) {
  var clientId = gaCookie.split('.')[2] + '.' + gaCookie.split('.')[3];
} 

</script>

<!-- 20230723 針對覆蓋式 browser 不同時 的不同呼叫時機 -->
<script>
    function debounceForAds(func, wait, immediate) {
        var timeout ;
        return function executedFunction() {
        var context = this;
        var args = arguments;
        var later = function() {
            timeout = null;
            if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
        };

        var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
        
        clearTimeout(timeout);

        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
        if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
        };
    };
    // 添加瀏覽器判斷
    var isChromium = window.chrome;
    var winNav = window.navigator;
    var vendorName = winNav.vendor;
    var isOpera = typeof window.opr !== "undefined";
    var isIEedge = winNav.userAgent.indexOf("Edg") > -1;
    var isIOSChrome = winNav.userAgent.match("CriOS");
    var isGoogle = false;
    var showCoverAds = false;
   
    if (isIOSChrome) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else if(
      isChromium !== null &&
      typeof isChromium !== "undefined" &&
      vendorName === "Google Inc." &&
      isOpera === false &&
      isIEedge === false
    ) {
      isGoogle = true;
    } else { 
      // 非google 直接跳出
      showCoverAds = true;
    }
</script>

<!-- PMP 1 20180918起 -->
  <!-- This is the Header script for Header Bidding -->
  <script>
  //This is where ucfunnel adunit is defined

    var HEADER_TIMEOUT = 1000;

    var adUnits = [{
    code: 'div-gpt-ad-1530270190918-0',
    sizes: [[970, 250]],
    bids: [{
        bidder: 'ucfunnel',
        params: {
          adid: "ad-AA776974DBEAB33BC8398BD23834A27B"        //String - required
        }
      }
    ]
  }];

    var hbjs = hbjs || {};
    hbjs.que = hbjs.que || [];
  </script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->
    <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn.aralego.net/hbjs/v2/headerbid.js" async></script>
    <!--Init hbjs-->

  <script>
    var HASAD = 0;
    var secret = []
    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
    });

    hbjs.que.push(function() {
        hbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);
        hbjs.requestBids({
            bidsBackHandler: sendAdserverRequest
        });
    });

    function sendAdserverRequest() {
      var highestCpmBids = hbjs.getHighestCpmBids();
        if (highestCpmBids.length > 0) {
          HASAD = 1;
        }
        highestCpmBids.forEach(bid => {
          if (bid.ad.indexOf("hasSecret") > 0) {
            secret.push(bid.adUnitCode);
          }
        })
        if (hbjs.adserverRequestSent) return;
        hbjs.adserverRequestSent = true;
        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            hbjs.que.push(function() {
                hbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
                googletag.pubads().refresh();
            });
        });
    }

    setTimeout(function() {
        sendAdserverRequest();
    }, HEADER_TIMEOUT);

  </script>

    /* (webonly_970x250PMP) */
    /* 網頁 -- 【經濟VIP】全站巨無霸970*250 */
    slot1 = googletag.defineSlot('/129853887/udn.com/money/Web/money_970*250_PMP', [[970, 250], [1, 1], 'fluid'], 'div-gpt-ad-1530270190918-0').defineSizeMapping(webonly_970x250PMP).setCollapseEmptyDiv(true).addService(googletag.pubads());

/* googletag slotRenderEnded event listener */
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
var slot = event.slot;
var size = event.size;

// console.log(slot.getAdUnitPath());
// console.log(slot.getSlotElementId());
// console.log(size);

if (slot.getAdUnitPath() == '/129853887/udn.com/money/Mobile/320*480-Cover-1') {
var popupEl = document.querySelector('.overlay-container');

if (popupEl != null && size[0] == 1 && size[1] == 1) {
popupEl.style.display = 'none';
}
}
// 內文廣告 排除lab 架構
if(slot === slot2 && window.location.href.indexOf('lab7') < 0){
document.getElementById('before').style.display = 'inline-block';
document.getElementById('after').style.display = 'inline-block';
}

});
<!--止-->

  });

//var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
//var myParam = urlParams.get('show_active');
$.urlParam = function(name){
    var results = new RegExp('[\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)').exec(window.location.href);
    if (results == null){
       return null;
    }
    else {
       return decodeURI(results[1]) || 0;
    }
}

//index use cookie save userAction 
$(window).ready(function(){
	$('#index_ad_2  a.more').click(function(){
		 if($(this).parent().text().indexOf('大盤走勢') != -1){
			setCookie('userAction','event=systex_market')
		 }
	 });
});




function is_useServiceNew() {
	if (GetCkValue('userAction') != ''){
		userAction = '?'+decodeURIComponent(GetCkValue('userAction'));
		alert(userAction)
	}
	$.confirm({
		title: '',
		content: '享受暢讀權益，啟用經濟日報會員服務',
		boxWidth: '285px',
		useBootstrap: false,
		buttons: {
			confirm: {
				text: '啟用meta',
				action: function () {
					$.ajax({
						type : 'POST',
						url : '/api/v1/member/activeMoneyMember'+ userAction,
						async:false,
						xhrFields: {withCredentials: true},
						crossDomain:true,
						success : function (response){
							if(response['success'] == true) {
								alert('啟用成功');
								window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
							} else {
								alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							}
						},
						error : function(){
							alert('啟用失敗，請至會員中心重新登入。');
							window.location.href=$('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content');
						}
					}); // end
				}
			},
			cancel: {
				text: '稍後再說',
				action: function () {}
			}
		}
	});
}
</script>
</head>
<!-- #Location: /inc/meta -->

<script>
  if (window.innerWidth < 1024 && document.cookie.indexOf("smart_banner_close=true") < 0) {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "flex";

    var style = document.createElement('style');
    var css = document.createTextNode('.drop-down-mask { top : 170px; }');
    style.appendChild(css);
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }

  const downloadBtn = document.getElementById("download_app_btn");
  downloadBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    let url = "https://edn.page.link/ednappdl2023";
    window.location.href = url ;
  });

  const smartBannercloseBtn = document.querySelector(".appbanner_btns .i-close");
  smartBannercloseBtn .addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.querySelector(".appbanner").style.display = "none";
    const today = new Date();
    const setDays = 2;
    const expires = new Date(today.getTime() + (setDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)); // 設定 cookie 的時長為 7 天
    document.cookie = "smart_banner_close=true; expires=" + expires.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
  });
</script>										    <!-- 970*250廣告 -->

              <script>
                  function subscribeConfirm() {
                    // alert($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content'));
                    if( parseInt($("meta[name='identity']").attr('content')) < 2 ) {
                        $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱');
                    } else {
                      $('.btn-vip').text('訂閱中');
                    }
                  }
                  $(document).ready(function(){
                    $('.btn-vip').click(function(){
                        location.href = '/money/order';
                    })
                  });
                  if (typeof $.cookie('udngold') === "undefined") {
                      $(".icon-user").children().click( function () {
                          if ($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content') === '') {
                            //沒url就導回首頁
                            window.location.href ='https://money.udn.com/member/member_login?site=m_money&again=y&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fmoney.udn.com%2Fmoney%2Findex';
                          } else {
                            window.location.href =$("meta[name='origion_common_url']").attr('content') + '/member/member_login?site=money&again=y&redirect=' +
                            encodeURIComponent($('meta[property="og:url"]').attr('content'));
                          }
                      })
                  } else {
                      $(".icon-user").children().removeClass("i-money-user-2");
                      $(".icon-user").children().addClass("i-money-user-out-2");
                  }
              </script>

      <script>
        $(document).ready(function(){
            function searchSubmit(e) {
              e.preventDefault();
              var key = $('.money-search__wrapper .search__input').val();
              var url = '/search/result/1001/';
              location.href = url + encodeURIComponent(key)
            }
            $(".money-search__wrapper .i-money-search").on("click",searchSubmit);
            $('.money-search__wrapper .search__form').on('submit', searchSubmit);
        });
      </script>

<script>
	(function(){
		var $domReady = window.jQuery || window.domready;
		$domReady(function(){
			var channel_id = 1001;
			var page = $("#more").attr("data-page");
      var finalPage = $("#more").attr("data-finalpage");
			var key = $("#more").attr("data-key");
		});
	}());
</script>

      top: 50%;
      /*top: 0;*/
      left: 50%;
      -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      /*transform: translate(-50%, 0);*/
      z-index: 10000;
      opacity: 0;
      visibility: hidden;
      -webkit-transition: opacity 300ms ease-in;
      transition: opacity 300ms ease-in;
    }
    .overlay-mask {
      z-index: 9999;
      position: fixed;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
      opacity: 0;
      -webkit-transition: opacity 300ms ease-in;
      transition: opacity 300ms ease-in;
      visibility: hidden;
    }
    @-webkit-keyframes fadeInUp {
      0% {
        opacity: 0;
      }
      100% {
        opacity: 1;
      }
    }
    @keyframes fadeInUp {
      0% {
        opacity: 0;
      }
      100% {
        opacity: 1;
      }
    }
    .fadeInUp {
      -webkit-animation-name: fadeInUp;
      animation-name: fadeInUp;
    }
    </style>

<script>
    var adTimerId ;
    var count = 0;
    function checkDom() {
        var el = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe');
        if (el.length > 0) {
            let setWidth = $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0').width();
            $('#div-gpt-ad-1564727433317-0 iframe').attr('width', setWidth)
            clearInterval(adTimerId );
        } else {
            // 如果為空，表示 dom 不存在，則在控制台輸出訊息
            count++;
            if (count == 10) {
                clearInterval(adTimerId);
            }
        }
    }
    adTimerId = setInterval(checkDom, 1000);
</script>

<!-- 以下原架構為去除bottomAd 那層 -->
<div id="bottomAd">
  <div id="google_ad">
    <div id='moneyAD-Mobile-sticky' style='width:320px;'>
     <script>
       googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('moneyAD-Mobile-sticky'); });
     </script>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="closeBtn"></div>
</div>



<script>
var isShow = true;
$(document).ready(function(){ 
        var adDiv = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').css('display');
        // var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd').children('#google_ad').children('div').find('iframe').length;//20211129之前
	$(window).scroll(function(){
        var isAdDivHasContent = $('#bottomAd iframe').length;//20211129之後
		var Wheight = $(window).scrollTop();
                var adHeight = $('#bottomAd').height()
		if (Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight>=100) {
			$('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').addClass('show');
                        
		}else if(Wheight > 100 && isShow && adDiv !== 'none' && isAdDivHasContent > 0 && adHeight < 100) {
                       $('#bottomAd').addClass('show');
                       $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
                }else {
			$('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
                        $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
		}
                
                if(adHeight < 100) {
                  //console.log('adHeight:' + adHeight)
                $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
        }

	});

        $('.closeBtn').click(function(){
            $('#bottomAd').removeClass('show');
            $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
            isShow = false;
        });	
});

// 針對特殊廣告 讓自訂的closeButton 不出現
$(window).on('load',function(){
      if($('#MediaBook-AD2').length > 0 || $('.innity-apps-pull-up-touch-layer').length > 0) {
         $('.closeBtn').removeClass('show');
         isShow = false;
      }
       
});
</script>

<script>
//用js 添加class 給CMS 版位
  var url = new URL(location.href);
  if (url.pathname.indexOf('vipindex') > -1) {
    // console.log('你是vip 你真棒');
    $('#footer section.toggle-list').addClass('sitemap--bg-dark')
  }

$(document).ready(function() {
  $.fn.center = function () {
    this.css("position", "absolute");
    this.css("top", Math.max(0, (($(window).height() - this.innerHeight()) / 2) + $(window).scrollTop()) + "px");
    this.css("left", Math.max(0, (($(window).width() - this.outerWidth()) / 2) + $(window).scrollLeft()) + "px");
    return this;
  }

  $.fn.show_box = function (url) {
    $('#show_box').stop(true, true).load(url, function () {

      $('#show_box .close').click(function () {
        $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
      });

    });
    $('#show_box').fadeIn();
  }

    //閒置頁面
    timeoutHandle = null;
    if ($(window).width() > 749) {
      idleState = false;
      idleWait = 300000; /* 5'm */
      if (location.href.indexOf('idlePageTest') > -1) {
        idleWait = 5000; /* 5's */
      }
      $('body').bind('mousemove click keydown scroll', function () {
        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
        timeoutHandle = setTimeout(function () {

          var channel_id = $('meta[name="channel_id"]').attr('content');
          var cate_id = $('meta[name="cate_id"]').attr('content');
          $(this).show_box('/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id);
          ga('money.send', 'event', 'Idlepage_' + channel_id, 'popup', { 'page': '/common/threemin/' + channel_id + '/' + cate_id });

        }, idleWait);
      });
      $('body').trigger("mousemove");
    }

    $(window).on("scroll", function (e) {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
    
    $(document).on("pagecreate tap scrollstart", function () {
      $('#show_box').stop(true, true).fadeOut();
    });
});
</script>

<!-- 錨點移動功能 -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
    function hashScroll() {
      target = $(window.location.hash);
      event.preventDefault();
          $('html, body').animate({
              scrollTop: target.offset().top - 50
          }, 500);

      if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
      $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      setTimeout(function() {
      $( window ).scroll(function() {
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "flex");
      });
      }, 1000);
    }
    document.onreadystatechange = subSomething;//當頁面載入狀態改變的時候執行這個方法.
    function subSomething() {
      if(document.readyState == 'complete') {
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0){
        $("div.money-menu").css("display", "none");
      }
        if(window.location.hash.length > 0) {
          hashScroll()
        }
      } //當頁面載入狀態
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('hashchange', function() {
      hashScroll()
  }, false);
</script>

		<script>
  /**
   * 訂閱及買斷補服務代碼給 cas
   */
  function setServiceForCas() {
    var udngold = GetCkValue("udngold");
    var udnland = GetCkValue("udnland");
    var services = GetCkValue("services");
    if(udngold !== "" && udnland !== "" && services !== "") {
      var sub_check = GetCkValue("sub_check");
      var buyout_check = GetCkValue("buyout_check");
      if(sub_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/sub", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
      if(buyout_check === '') {
        $.post("/api/v1/member/service/buyout", function(data) { console.log(data); }, "json");
      }
    }
  }

  $(document).ready(function() {
    // setServiceForCas();
  });
</script>
